Overview: Hello! I’m Sai Suhrut Sala, a Master’s student in Information Systems at the University of Utah and a Software Engineer with a background in Computer Science from Osmania University. Experienced in full-stack development, I specialize in creating efficient, user-centric solutions using technologies like C#, .NET, and Vue.js. Committed to innovation and efficiency, my work focuses on enhancing technology to improve everyday life. Join me in exploring the potential of technology to transform our world.

Education.CollegeName: David Eccless school of business- University of Utah
